item.source: Just Purchased, crashes immediately when I try to start the tutorial

item.title: Just Purchased, crashes immediately when I try to start the tutorial
item.dc:creator: Ellie
item.description:
So it might have been a bugged build with the recent patch. I put out a patch on the beta server that might work for you.

To join the test server, right click ToL in Steam and go to Properties.
Go to the Beta tab and then enter the code “twelvecharacters”
Then select testing2 in the dropdown.

You will still be able to play with people on the live server.

Read full topic
item.source: Just Purchased, crashes immediately when I try to start the tutorial

item.title: Just Purchased, crashes immediately when I try to start the tutorial

Are your graphics drivers up to date?
